languages.text: {n}Взгляд друкари полнится восторгом и насмешкой.{/n} "Минимальная мощность. Я бы даже сказал — ничтожная. Неужели ты думал{mf||а}, что я так быстро сломаю... свою новую игрушку?"
{n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд друкари полнится восторгом и насмешкой.{/n} "Минимальная мощность. Я бы даже сказал — ничтожная. Неужели ты думал{mf||а}, что я так быстро сломаю... свою новую игрушку?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"
{n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"
{n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"
{n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的目光中闪烁着喜悦与嘲弄的光芒。{/n}“刚刚那只是最为微不足道的力量，老实说，几乎相当于毫无感觉。莫非你真的以为，我会急于弄坏……我的新玩具吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的目光中闪烁着喜悦与嘲弄的光芒。{/n}“刚刚那只是最为微不足道的力量，老实说，几乎相当于毫无感觉。莫非你真的以为，我会急于弄坏……我的新玩具吗？”

languages.text: {n}デュカーリの目は歓喜と嘲笑で輝く。{/n}「力は最小だぞ。ほとんど効いてないだろう。俺がそんなに急いで壊してしまうと思ったか…俺の新しいオモチャなのに？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリの目は歓喜と嘲笑で輝く。{/n}「力は最小だぞ。ほとんど効いてないだろう。俺がそんなに急いで壊してしまうと思ったか…俺の新しいオモチャなのに？」

languages.text: {n}Ves un destello de burla y regocijo en los ojos del drukhari.{/n} «Y eso ha sido a la mínima potencia. Apenas una caricia, diría yo. ¿De verdad pensabas que iba a romper tan rápido mi... nuevo juguete?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves un destello de burla y regocijo en los ojos del drukhari.{/n} «Y eso ha sido a la mínima potencia. Apenas una caricia, diría yo. ¿De verdad pensabas que iba a romper tan rápido mi... nuevo juguete?».

languages.text: {n}Une joie malsaine et empreinte de moquerie illumine le regard du Drukhari.{/n} « Et encore, ce n'était guère que sa puissance minimale. Plus de peur que de mal, en somme. Vous ne pensiez tout de même pas que je serais si pressé de casser mon... nouveau jouet ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une joie malsaine et empreinte de moquerie illumine le regard du Drukhari.{/n} « Et encore, ce n'était guère que sa puissance minimale. Plus de peur que de mal, en somme. Vous ne pensiez tout de même pas que je serais si pressé de casser mon... nouveau jouet ? »

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Drukhari blitzen vor Freude und Spott.{/n} "Das war die geringste Stärke. Eigentlich war das fast noch gar nichts. Dachtet Ihr wirklich, ich würde ... mein neues Spielzeug ... so schnell kaputtmachen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Drukhari blitzen vor Freude und Spott.{/n} "Das war die geringste Stärke. Eigentlich war das fast noch gar nichts. Dachtet Ihr wirklich, ich würde ... mein neues Spielzeug ... so schnell kaputtmachen?"

languages.text: {n}Drukhari'nin gözleri, zevk ve keyifle parlıyor.{/n} "Bu en düşük güçteki hâliydi. Hatta neredeyse hiç gücü yoktu diyebilirim. Sence yeni... Oyuncağımı bozmak için böyle acele eder miyim?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari's eyes glitter with delight and mockery.{/n} "That was minimal power. Barely any at all, I would say. Did you really think I would be in such a hurry to break... my new toy?"
